@graph.name: Buffalo Chickpea Pizza with White Garlic Sauce and Celery Ranch Dressing
@graph.description: This Vegan Buffalo Chickpea Pizza with White Garlic Sauce and Celery ranch dressing packs a ton of flavor and takes minutes to put together. soy-free. Makes 1 large or 2 small pizzas.

video.name: Buffalo Chickpea Pizza with Celery Ranch - VeganRicha.com

Pizza with White Garlic Sauce, Chickpeas in Buffalo Hot Sauce, drizzled with Celery Ranch.
Recipe :--- http://www.veganricha.com/2014/09/buffalo-chickpea-pizza-white-garlic-sauce-celery-ranch-vegan-recipe.html

****************************************­*******

This Pizza comes together quickly with my 20 Minute Pizza Crust. The sauce and ranch looks like a lot of ingredients, but they are mainly cashew cream, divided into 2 bowls, spiced up and used as  White Garlic sauce and Vegan Ranch. Make it once and the second time it will be a breeze! 
Buffalo sauce + Ranch + chickpeas = heaven.
Make this Buffalo Chickpea Pizza!

recipeIngredient: or any of my gluten free crusts
15 oz can chickpeas  (or 1.5 cups cooked chickpeas)
a very generous dash of black pepper
2/3  of the white sauce from above
4 cloves of roasted garlic  (or 1 tsp garlic powder)
1/3  of the white sauce from above

recipeInstructions.text: Make the pizza dough according to recipe. Use double the pizza dough recipe to make 2 pizzas.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the pizza dough according to recipe. Use double the pizza dough recipe to make 2 pizzas.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Buffalo chickpeas: Mix everything under buffalo chickpeas. Mash a few chickpeas and let sit and marinate while you prep the sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Buffalo chickpeas: Mix everything under buffalo chickpeas. Mash a few chickpeas and let sit and marinate while you prep the sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the White sauce: Blend all the ingredients under white sauce base until well combined into a smooth sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the White sauce: Blend all the ingredients under white sauce base until well combined into a smooth sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the White Garlic sauce: Take about a 2/3 part of the white sauce from above and add garlic sauce ingredients. Mix well. Taste and adjust and mix or blend.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the White Garlic sauce: Take about a 2/3 part of the white sauce from above and add garlic sauce ingredients. Mix well. Taste and adjust and mix or blend.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Celery Ranch: Add the ranch seasoning, celery and vinegar and mix and keep ready.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Celery Ranch: Add the ranch seasoning, celery and vinegar and mix and keep ready.

recipeInstructions.text: Shape the pizza dough to a 10 inch rounds with thick edges so the sauce does not flow off the pizza during baking. Brush olive oil on it. Drizzle enough garlic sauce on the dough to coat. Add spinach or greens or other veggies of choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Shape the pizza dough to a 10 inch rounds with thick edges so the sauce does not flow off the pizza during baking. Brush olive oil on it. Drizzle enough garlic sauce on the dough to coat. Add spinach or greens or other veggies of choice.

recipeInstructions.text: Layer buffalo chickpeas on the greens. Drizzle some buffalo sauce from the marinade.
recipeInstructions.name: Layer buffalo chickpeas on the greens. Drizzle some buffalo sauce from the marinade.

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle a generous amount of celery ranch. Add vegan mozzarella cheese shreds (optional). Try any of my cheeses
recipeInstructions.name: Drizzle a generous amount of celery ranch. Add vegan mozzarella cheese shreds (optional). Try any of my cheeses

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at pre-heated 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 14 minutes. Broil for a minute to crisp.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at pre-heated 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 14 minutes. Broil for a minute to crisp.

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle any leftover garlic sauce or celery ranch before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Drizzle any leftover garlic sauce or celery ranch before serving.
